features

Enduring a troublesome website is no longer the status quo.

Lean, mean selling machines for everyone!

  1. Discovery

    What is the current status of your web presence, vs what your ultimate goals are for it.

  2. Exploration

    What are some current tools/technologies that could be put to use to improve the current status.

  3. Creative Sparks

    What are some 'pain points' in the business operation that modern web tools might address?.

  4. Interactive Exploration

    What's the tool you've never been able to find, that would save you massive time or money?

  • How Does The Internet and My Website Actually Work?

    Learn the 5 minute version of how the internet actually works and make the complicated feel simpler.

  • Why Every Business Needs A Domain

    Your own domain name is one of the best ways to benefit your online presence.

  • Building With Cosmic

    Cosmic keeps all your stuff; however you want it.

  • Getting Started With Astro

    Astro is a real game changer in the war on slow and expensive websites.
